name: FinTech & Business
description: Sector template for fintech and business method patents including payments, workflow, and e-commerce.
contextDescription: FinTech and business method patents cover payment systems, digital commerce, and business workflows. Key areas include payment processing (G06Q20/*), commerce (G06Q30/*), and workflow automation (G06Q10/*). Targets include payment networks (Visa, Mastercard), digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal), and e-commerce platforms (Amazon, Shopify). Business method patents face heightened Alice/§101 scrutiny.
scoringGuidance: Payment patents must survive Alice/§101 analysis - assess technical implementation.
Fraud detection patents with technical implementations are more defensible.
Digital wallet/mobile payment patents target high-growth markets.
Consider both issuer-side and merchant-side implementations.
Cross-border payment patents have high value due to complex technical requirements.

questions.question: Does this patent relate to payment processing, authorization, or settlement?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Payment patents target Visa, Mastercard, and digital wallets. Assess payment relevance.

questions.question: How likely is this patent to survive Alice/§101 scrutiny? Score based on technical implementation specificity.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Business method patents face §101 challenges. Assess technical implementation depth.

questions.question: Does this patent address fraud detection, transaction security, or authentication?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Fraud/security patents have technical grounding. Assess security aspects.

questions.question: Does this patent apply to digital wallets, mobile payments, or contactless transactions?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Digital wallets are growing rapidly. Assess mobile payment applicability.
